trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref>.
Returns the strokes that are a result of the eraser path erasing a stroke.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает росчерки, являющиеся результатом стирания росчерка путем ластика.

trans-unit.source: The GetPointEraseResults method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains the strokes that result in the eraser path erasing the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A> where they intersect.
trans-unit.target: Метод GetPointEraseResults возвращает <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>, содержащий штрихов, которые приводят к пути стирание ластика <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A>их пересечения.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: If the eraser path intersects the middle of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A>, the GetPointEraseResults method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Если путь ластика пересекается с середины <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A>, возвращаемое методом GetPointEraseResults <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>, содержащий двумя новыми.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the strokes that are created after the eraser path erases part of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke*>.
trans-unit.target: Объект <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> , содержащий штрихов, которые были созданы после путем ластика стирает часть <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke*>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that is intersected by the eraser path.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that is intersected by the eraser path.
